ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Bard% was (Patch message)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe.  I guess I was being intellectually lazy.  The thing is, there are so few places where see invis is useful, and those are so obvious to all the other
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe. I guess I was being intellectually lazy. The thing is, there are so few places where see invis is
useful, and those are so obvious to all the other casters, that they reflexively toss see invis on
everyone else before I can bother to remem this song. I've had less practical use for this song than I
have for Melanie's Melifluous Motion. I'll concede that saying it was "pointless" was an overstatement.
But still, it is by no means a strong addition to our song arsenal, particularly once see invis was added
to invisibility. Easily bottom 10.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 57 songs, Innoruuk


"Reeves, Patrick W" wrote:

> *sigh* Did Kenross get sold on ebay? To say that the needed change to the
> lvl 19 song (adding see invis) made the lvl 24 song pointless is about the
> stupidest thing I have read on this or any list. Next time you need to see
> invis with a pet caster around see how much they enjoy recasting their pet
> when you pulse clouding to see invis. Or maybe when you are fighting invis
> mobs in PoA or another zone and have to use your flute so your party can see
> the invis mob you are fighting.
